name: Coffin Tree Remastered
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After being lost for almost twenty years, the XVX System game Coffin Tree has been found and restored for modern devices. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"You play the role of a secret agent who has been assigned to a distant research station. Tasked with studying the deadly anomaly that has all but destroyed the world, you will soon discover things here are not what they seem and that an even more deadly threat awaits you..."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features

-Retro VR FPS title now playable as a web browser game. 

-Augmented Reality and  Cross Compatibility With other Tulpaco Collection games using The Expansion Cloud.

-Four player classes to choose from. Rogue, Warrior, Mystic and Engineer. Each with different skills and perks.

-Three difficulty levels, with the fourth Mode to be added on in a later update.

-Original Soundtrack by Jakob Tooms restored with additional tracks by Spooky Vaporwave Producer Suzume No Shinigami along with many other guest artists.

-To celebrate Coffin Tree's 25th anniversary Harvest Mode is now included. Face off against entire armies of monsters in a variety of carefully curated maps.

-Explore the Lost Kingdom Of Arbor Necroth and it's many hidden secrets.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With much of the game's original assets completely destroyed or lost we have been dependant on some community-designed resources, most notably we used the Shotgun Sprite from the Freedoom Project.

This game made was made in RPG Maker MV using the MV3D Plugin by Cutievirus. 

Additional art credits:

Owl Monks- "Death Sprite" created by whtdragon

The Crawling Death- "Catapillar" created By Avery

Lost Knight- "Skeleton Leader" Created by Matseb

*Edited* Wicker Knight- Tree Golem by Matseb

Complete set- Mack's VX Style Style Sprites

Additional Music Credits:

Main Menu Theme - The Otherside Left/Right Game by Dark Somnium

Harvest Mode Themes - Lights Out and Blood Sport by Karl Casey, aka White Bat Audio

Main Soundtrack By Jakob Tooms, produced and mixed by Shinigami No Suzume

Voice Acting Credits- Julia Dapper

The years have not been kind on this title. The porting and translation process has been arduous and there certainly are many spelling and programming errors present.

*While The Tulpa Corporation is a large organization as you are aware due to certain events our entire team is working remotely and while we will endeavor to fix or rectify any mistakes there could be significant delays for technical support. 

We hope that you enjoy the game.
